trends: There have been no other sightings in Mt Vernon
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details I was outside finishing a conversation withmy mother. Over her right shoulder I suddenly saw a long, dark object with anunblinking green light shoot diagonally down and disappear behind the treeline. There was no sound. I was astonished at first, but as I had seen another yearsbefore and had strange dreams concerning UFOs and beings, I felt elated andhappy, almost as if seeing it was reassuring to me. After, I had furtherexperiences of precognition.
Summary: Saw long craft with unblinking green light.
